# TSPS - Two (2) Senior Learning Designers and one (1) Intermediate Graphic Designer

## Tender Notice Information
### Reference Number
*cb-884-21157923*

### Amendment Number
*2*

### Solicitation Number
*W6369-24-X009*

### Publication Date
*2024-04-11*

### Tender Closing Date
*2024-05-06T14:00:00*

### Amendment Date
*2024-05-06*

## Tender Details
* [Training planning, facilitation and delivery services](#training-planning-facilitation-and-delivery-services)
* Supply Arrangement Holder - Tier 1 notification

## Description of Work
The Department of National Defence requires two (2) Senior Learning Designers and one (1) Intermediate Graphic Designer to develop and update course content and courseware assets specific to Procurement & Contracting using the methodology, tools, and templates provided by the department.

## Tender Requirements
* The tender is open to Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) Supply Arrangement Holders who are qualified under Tier 1 for services in the National Capital Region.
* Candidates must possess expertise in the following categories:
  * 7.2 Learning Designers, Level 3
  * 7.9 Graphic Designer, Level 2
* Candidates must agree to work with the methodology, tools, and templates provided by DND

## Instructions to Tenderers
* Tenders can be downloaded from the Canada Buys website
* Tenderers must submit their proposals in English or French, either in paper or electronic form, according to your preference
* Tenders must be received no later than 14:00, 2024-05-06

## Additional Documentation
* Tender notice in English: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/35766/w6369-24-x009-npp_en.pdf>
* Tender notice in French: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/35766/w6369-24-x009-npp_fr.pdf>

## Tender Contact Information
* Rogelio Orsetti, Petrocelli
* Rogelio.Orsettipetrocelli@forces.gc.ca
* [Phone number]: 00000000
